version_description: Bug fixes and other improvements to game performance
Bug fixes and other improvements to game performance

- KEEPERS are now available! Pick two batters and a pitcher from your TSB18 roster to add to your TSB19 team!
- CLUB PROFILES let you show off your accomplishments!
- New PERKS from ALL-STAR LEVELS let you further up your game!
- Chat improvements and better EMOJI support make working together that much more fun!
- Relievers have been added to CLUB CLASH!
- More BENEFIT from your CUSTOM LEGEND all year as he improves alongside your team
- Updated ROSTERS, STATS, and UNIFORMS for 2019!
- Improvements to game performance and bug fixes

- Choose your path with new Walk-Off Hero DIFFICULTY TOWERS
- More unique PERKS in All-Star Levels
- Coordinate better with your Club Mates with ONLINE STATUS indicators
- Load time improvements and menu performance optimizations
- Improvements to game performance and bug fixes

- Choose your path with new Walk-Off Hero DIFFICULTY TOWERS
- More unique PERKS in All-Star Levels
- Coordinate better with your Club Mates with ONLINE STATUS indicators
- Load time improvements and menu performance optimizations
- Improvements to game performance and bug fixes

- Play like a pro and earn weekly achievements with the all new FIELD PASS!
- Can’t get enough competition? Check out the new EXTRA BASES mode!
- No more bad luck with Mystery Box GUARANTEES!
- Add some flare to your life with new CHAT STICKERS
- New powerful ALL-STAR BUFFS
- New rare Batter and Pitcher SKILLS
- Let ‘em know who’s boss with CvC SMACK TALK!
- INVITE FRIENDS to earn exclusive rewards!
- Spread the love by sending your friends GIFT BUNDLES
- Get all your awesome free stuff in one place in the GIFTS Inbox

• Join the action with WILD CARD and POSTSEASON special events!
• Earn better rewards by progressing to higher CLUB LEAGUES!
• Event Royale Weekends COMING SOON!
• New Unique Club Event ACCOLADES
• Even more ALL-STAR BUFFS
• New pitcher SKILLS
• Edit your lineup directly from the BONUS POINTS screen
• Improved CvC Bonus Player List visibility
• Dynamic CvC leaderboard sizes
• Collect Club Level-up Rewards in your INBOX

• Never-Before-Released LEGENDS and ALL-TIME GREATS
• New SPECIAL EVENT WEEK functionality, including MIDNIGHT MADNESS and RELENTLESS ROYALE
• Weekly Player SPOTLIGHTS - Grab temporarily boosted Player Spotlight boxes every week
• AFTER HOURS EVENTS - Never stop competing!
• MORE Rewards from Event Royale - Earn new players from Tournament Mode, Walk Off Hero, and more!
• Improvements to game performance and bug fixes
